mapper.insert: insert into users(id, last_message_id, last_ref_id, last_text, last_kbd, data) VALUES (#{u.id}, #{u.msgId}, #{u.s1}, #{u.s2}, #{u.s3}, #{u.s4})
mapper.select: select id, last_message_id as "msgId", last_ref_id as "s1", last_text as "s2", last_kbd as "s3", data as "s4" from users where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update users set last_message_id = #{u.msgId}, last_ref_id = #{u.s1}, last_text = #{u.s2}, last_kbd = #{u.s3}, data = #{u.s4} where id = #{u.id}
